00092 
00093         //  Make sure we have the right stuff       
00094         if ( 'tabs' == $this->widgetName )
00095         {
00096             if ( ! $this->paneClass )
00097                 throw new CException( Yii::t( 'yii', 'When creating "tabs" you must set the "paneClass" option to the class of the div containing the tab panes.' ) );

00144     protected function generateJavascript( $sClassName = null, $arOptions = null, $sInsertBeforeOptions = null )
00145     {
00146         //  Fix up tabs...
00147         if ( null == $sInsertBeforeOptions && 'tabs' == $this->widgetName )
00148             $sInsertBeforeOptions = '"div.' . $this->paneClass . ' > div"';
00149             
00150         //  Expose widget is attached to target as a click event...
00151         switch ( $this->widgetName )
00152         {
00153             case 'expose':
00154                 $_arOptions = ( null != $arOptions ) ? $arOptions : $this->makeOptions();
00155                 $_sId = ( null != $sClassName ) ? '.' . $sClassName : ( ! $this->isEmpty( $this->target ) ) ? $this->target : '#' . $this->id;
00156                 $_sScript = "$(\"{$_sId}\").click(function(){\$(this).expose({$_arOptions}).load();});";
00157                 break;
00158             
00159             case 'flashembed':
00160                 $_sSrc = $this->getOption( 'src', null );
00161                 $_arOptions = $this->makeOptions();
00162                 $_sScript = '$("' . $this->target . '").flashembed("' . $_sSrc . '", ' . $_arOptions . ');';
00163                 break;
00164                 
00165             default:
00166                 $_sScript = parent::generateJavascript( $sClassName, $arOptions, $sInsertBeforeOptions );
00167                 break;
00168         }
00169         
00170         return $this->script = $_sScript;
00171     }
